name: Secret Forest Path
description: Elena knows a hidden path through the woods that avoids the main roads.
offerText: You know, I've lived here all my life. There's a path through the woods that most folks don't know about...
purchaseText: Since I trust you, I'll share this secret. Follow the old oak with the broken branch, then look for the moss-covered stones...
refusalText: Maybe another time then. Some secrets are worth keeping.

name: Noble Contact Introduction
description: Marcus can introduce you to a noble contact in the capital.
offerText: I've been doing business with Lord Ashford for years. Perhaps it's time I introduced you two...
purchaseText: I'll write you a letter of introduction. Lord Ashford values my judgment - treat him well.
refusalText: Very well. Such introductions must be handled delicately anyway.

name: Shadow Market Access
description: The river worker can get you into the underground market.
offerText: You seem like someone who appreciates... alternative commerce. There's a place I could show you.
purchaseText: Tonight, after the moon sets. Look for the red lantern by the old pier. Knock three times, then twice.
refusalText: Smart choice. Not everyone's cut out for that kind of business.

name: Custom Climbing Gear
description: The workshop master will craft specialized climbing equipment.
offerText: I've been working on something special. Light, strong, and it'll get you up cliffs others can't climb.
purchaseText: Here you go - my finest work. The rope is woven with silk for strength and lightness. Use it well.
refusalText: No worries. Quality gear like this needs the right buyer.

name: Urgent Noble Letter
description: Elena has a special high-paying letter that needs discrete delivery.
offerText: A noble lady came by yesterday, very secretive. She needs a letter delivered urgently and... quietly.
purchaseText: I told her about you - said you were trustworthy. The letter will be ready tomorrow morning. The pay is exceptional.
refusalText: I understand. This kind of work isn't for everyone.

name: Shipping Manifest Information
description: The dock master shares valuable trade route information.

additionalData.information: The next shipment from the eastern provinces includes rare spices. Buy them here and sell in the capital for triple the price.

offerText: I see all the manifests that come through here. Some of that information could be... profitable for the right person.
purchaseText: Next week, eastern spice shipment. Buy all you can carry. Trust me on this one.
refusalText: Your loss. Information is the most valuable cargo of all.

name: Heavy Equipment Rental Service
description: The camp boss offers access to specialized heavy equipment rentals.
offerText: We've got equipment here that most folks can't afford to buy. But for the right person, I might consider rentals.
purchaseText: Alright, you've proven yourself reliable. Come by when you need heavy gear - we'll work out a fair rental price.
refusalText: Fair enough. This equipment is too valuable to trust to just anyone.
